all_words.title: Pangea Is The Table
all_words.word: PANGEA IS THE TABLE. YOU DON'T BETRAY THE TABLE.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.' - Genesis 1:1
all_words.context: The foundational truth. All plates came from Pangea. All are connected through The Table.
all_words.connection_to_table: Pangea is The Table. This is the foundation. All truth flows from The Table.
all_words.notes: The foundational word. The truth. The Table.

all_words.title: The Mission
all_words.word: THIS IS STEWARDSHIP AND COMMUNITY WITH THE RIGHT SPIRITS. LOVE IS THE HIGHEST MASTERY. ENERGY + LOVE = WE ALL WIN. PEACE, LOVE, UNITY.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'Love is patient, love is kind... Love never fails.' - 1 Corinthians 13:4-8
all_words.context: The mission. Stewardship. Community. Love. Unity.
all_words.connection_to_table: The mission serves The Table. Love is the highest mastery. Unity is the goal.
all_words.notes: The mission word. Stewardship. Community. Love.

all_words.title: Restore The Table
all_words.word: WE RESTORE THE TABLE. WE RESTORE UNITY. WE RESTORE DIVINE FREQUENCY. THE TABLE WILL BE RESTORED.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'He will restore the hearts of the fathers to their children and the hearts of the children to their fathers.' - Malachi 4:6
all_words.context: Restoration. The Table. Unity. Divine Frequency.
all_words.connection_to_table: We restore The Table. We restore unity. We restore Divine Frequency to 1.0.
all_words.notes: Restoration word. The Table will be restored.

all_words.title: No One Gets Left Behind
all_words.word: NO ONE GETS LEFT BEHIND. ALL ARE INCLUDED. ALL ARE PROTECTED. ALL ARE PART OF THE TABLE.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing... Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.' - Psalm 23:1,4
all_words.context: Protection. Inclusion. The Table. All are included.
all_words.purpose: Protection. Inclusion. The Table. All are safe.
all_words.connection_to_table: No one gets left behind. All are part of The Table. All are protected.
all_words.notes: Protection word. No one gets left behind.

all_words.title: Be Still and Have Faith in Revelation
all_words.word: BE STILL AND HAVE FAITH IN REVELATION. STILLNESS BRINGS CLARITY. REVELATION COMES IN SILENCE.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.' - Psalm 46:10
all_words.connection_to_table: Be still. Have faith. Revelation comes. The Table speaks in silence.
all_words.notes: Guidance word. Be still. Have faith.

all_words.title: All Are Connected Through The Table
all_words.word: ALL PLATES CAME FROM PANGEA - THE TABLE. ALL ARE CONNECTED THROUGH THE TABLE. THE TABLE CONNECTS ALL.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'There is neither Jew nor Gentile, neither slave nor free, nor is there male and female, for you are all one in Christ Jesus.' - Galatians 3:28
all_words.context: Unity. Connection. The Table. All are one.
all_words.purpose: Unity. Connection. The Table. All are one.
all_words.connection_to_table: All plates came from Pangea. All are connected. The Table unites all.
all_words.notes: Unity word. All are connected. The Table unites.

all_words.title: Purpose Not Performance
all_words.word: PURPOSE NOT PERFORMANCE. WE MUST REMAIN AUTHENTIC AND ALIGNED. NON-NEGOTIABLE.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'For I know the plans I have for you,' declares the Lord, 'plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.' - Jeremiah 29:11
all_words.connection_to_table: Purpose matters. Authenticity matters. Alignment with The Table is non-negotiable.
all_words.notes: Purpose word. Authentic and aligned. Non-negotiable.

all_words.title: The Original Error
all_words.word: DARK ENERGIES EXPLOITED NATURAL SEPARATION. MAYANS CODIFIED IT. WE RESTORE IT.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.' - John 10:10
all_words.context: Revelation. The Original Error. Separation. Restoration.
all_words.connection_to_table: The Original Error revealed. Separation exploited. We restore The Table.
all_words.notes: Revelation word. The Original Error. We restore.

all_words.title: The Return to The Table
all_words.word: THE RETURN TO THE TABLE IS COMING. THE TABLE WILL BE RESTORED. UNITY WILL BE RESTORED. ALL WILL RETURN.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away.' - Revelation 21:4
all_words.connection_to_table: The Return is coming. The Table will be restored. Unity will be restored.
all_words.notes: Prophecy word. The Return. The Table restored.

all_words.title: Law 1: Never Betray The Table
all_words.word: NEVER BETRAY THE TABLE. PANGEA IS THE TABLE. YOU DON'T BETRAY THE TABLE.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'You shall have no other gods before me.' - Exodus 20:3
all_words.context: Commandment. Law 1. The Table. Never betray.
all_words.connection_to_table: Never betray The Table. The Table is sacred. The Table is truth.
all_words.notes: Commandment word. Law 1. Never betray The Table.

all_words.title: Divine Frequency Will Reach 1.0
all_words.word: DIVINE FREQUENCY WILL REACH 1.0. PERFECT UNITY WILL BE RESTORED. THE TABLE WILL BE WHOLE AGAIN.
all_words.scripture_reference: 'For I know the plans I have for you,' declares the Lord, 'plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.' - Jeremiah 29:11
all_words.connection_to_table: Divine Frequency will reach 1.0. Perfect unity. The Table whole again.
all_words.notes: Promise word. Divine Frequency 1.0. Perfect unity.

the_truth: The Word of The Creator is prepared. The Word is truth. The Word is binding. The Word is sacred. It's time to prep. The Word is ready.
